channel.title: My Website --Still Building-- (Suggestion, Ideas, and Tips)
channel.description:
This is my new website hosted on my computer, Im very new to this and would like your opnions about it. Home page is BASIC html, and the forums are smf 1.14 with a camo them. If anyone could provide sugestions, opinions, or ideas it would be greatly appreciated.
[url=http://americasb2army.no-ip.org]americasb2army.no-ip.org [/url]
EDIT: Also I would like to know how fast the page loads on a regular cable connection, if anyone has it, hopefully you do. :P

item.title: My Website --Still Building-- (Suggestion, Ideas, and Tips)
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

Thanks for the suggestions

[quote=“Unhandled, post:6, topic:185415”][quote author=cause link=topic=247695.msg2088784#msg2088784 date=1204693535]
the flag looks kinda dumb.
[/quote]
He’s American, what do you expect?[/quote]

Also 3/4 of the people here are American so I would watch your damn mouth.

Read full topic
item.source: My Website --Still Building-- (Suggestion, Ideas, and Tips)

item.title: My Website --Still Building-- (Suggestion, Ideas, and Tips)
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

I needed to make it fast, I was trying to get my battlefield 2 server up also lol. Ok I have done a major overhaul I based this of a nature-ish looking web template and edited it in NVU from Linspire. Please tell me what you think.

Read full topic
